title: 求帮忙翻译AntiAura的杀戮光环部分
author: 子德
txt_content:
帮忙翻译以下部分。谢谢。机翻举报不谢。
Smokey_Days@浅念哥 @像素君 @Smokey_Days 随便叫几个人。

HeadMove:
    #Enable the blockage of clients attacking during fast rotations?
    Enabled: true
    #Cancel extremely fast head movement? This can block some forms of the Derp hack.
    #Though hard, may be triggered by a player trying to move their head incredibly quickly.
    CancelExtremeMovement: true
    #If CancelExrtemeMovement is enabled, The amount a player must have turned their head in the past tick to drag their head back to the original position.
    LagBackThreshold: 2.9
    #The amount that a player must have turned their head in the last hit to be considered "turning quickly", raising the threshold.
    MaxMove: 0.08
    #A sub-section of the HeadMove check which cancels unlikely hits.
    CancelMove:
      #The amount that a player must have turned their head during recent ticks to have their attacks temporarily cancelled.
      CancelMove: 0.15
      #If this is true, use the HeadMove threshold to set how much damage is to be blocked.
      #For example if the Threshold is 8, and the player has a Threshold of 4, block 50% of the damage.
      #If this is false, 100% of damage will always be blocked if the player violates the CancelMove.
      UseHeadMoveThreshold: true
      #The minimum Threshold a player must have hit for the HeadMove checks to cancel ANY damage from CancelMove.
      #If the Threshold is below (or the same as) this, CancelMove will not cancel any hits!
      MinimumBlockThreshold: 2
    #The time that a player "cannot" attack, and if they do their threshold will be raised. Does not block actual hits.
    CantAttackTime: 8
    #Amount of hacking hits to detect the person as hacking.
    Threshold: 8
    #How low should the Threshold be lowered every time a non-hacking hit occurs?
    SafeHitDecrease: 0.8
    HeadCommand: kick %PLAYER% Killaura is not allowed!#broadcast %PLAYER% was kicked for hacking! (Killaura)(H)
  Accuracy:
    #Enable the accuracy check? This checks how many hits are on target.
    #This does NOT check how close the cursor is to the hitbox of the enemy. It only checks for hits/misses. The angle check does that.
    Enabled: true
    #Take a look at the HeadMove check. This is exactly the same. 
    #Except that it is the point where the player must have moved their head recently this much to be defined as "Moving their head".
    #If a player has not moved their head much, it means they are hitting a static entity, in which case detecting hacks via accuracy would be impossible.
    IsMoving: 0.03
    #This will add extra threshold to a hit if it is from a large distance.
    DistanceAccounting:
      #Enable distance accounting?
      Enabled: true
      #How far away do you want the hit to be before extra threshold is added to it?
      #For example: If DistanceAmount is 3 and the hit if 4 blocks away, the Threshold will be increased by 1.3, not 1.
      #If hit was 5 blocks away, the Threshold would be increased by 1.6.
      DistanceAmount: 3.5
      #The "weight" of distance. Each block of distance is multiplied by the DistanceWeight.
      #To use the above example: If a player was 4 blocks away with a DistanceAmount of 3, the threshold would be raised by 1.3.
      #If DistanceWeight was at 1.0, it would be raised by 2.0 instead of 1.3.
      DistanceWeight: 0.25
    #Take into account movement on the yaw axis only?
    #This means if a player is swinging their head up and down wildly, they won't be counted as hacking.
    YawOnly: true
    #How high the threshold has to be to detect the player as hacking.
    Threshold: 8
    #How much should the Threshold decrease each time a player interacts without hitting an opponent.
    ArmSwingDecrease: 0.20
    #How much should the Threshold decrease per second of time?
    DecreasePerSecond: 0.15
    AccuracyCommand: kick %PLAYER% Killaura is not allowed!#broadcast %PLAYER% was kicked for hacking! (Killaura)(A)

replies.author: 像素君
replies.txt_content:
我不熟悉这个，所以翻译可能有错，记得检查一下~某些我看着像是命令所以没有翻译：

HeadMove:
    #Enable the blockage of clients attacking during fast rotations?
    Enabled: true
    #Cancel extremely fast head movement? This can block some forms of the Derp hack.
    #Though hard, may be triggered by a player trying to move their head incredibly quickly.
    CancelExtremeMovement: true
#If CancelExrtemeMovement is enabled, The amount a player must have turned their head in the past tick to drag their head back to the original position.
HeadMove:
#是否阻止玩家在快速转身时进行攻击？
启用：true
#取消快速的头部运动吗？这可以阻止某些类型的Derp攻击。
#虽然很难，但这一命令可能被一个试图快速移动头部的玩家所触发。
CancelExtremeMovement:true
#如果这一命令被启用，那么玩家必须得把他们的头向后转，把他们的头转回原来的位置。

    LagBackThreshold: 2.9
#The amount that a player must have turned their head in the last hit to be considered "turning quickly", raising the threshold.
LagBackThreshold:2.9
#这一数值将使玩家在最后一击中的转头被认为是“快速转身”。这样做将会提高难度。

    MaxMove: 0.08
#A sub-section of the HeadMove check which cancels unlikely hits.
MaxMove:0.08
#为避免不合常理的攻击而检查头部移动一个小数值。

    CancelMove:
      #The amount that a player must have turned their head during recent ticks to have their attacks temporarily cancelled.
CancelMove:
#这一数值将使玩家在最近一次攻击时必须转头，以使得他们的攻击被暂时取消。

      CancelMove: 0.15
      #If this is true, use the HeadMove threshold to set how much damage is to be blocked.
      #For example if the Threshold is 8, and the player has a Threshold of 4, block 50% of the damage.
      #If this is false, 100% of damage will always be blocked if the player violates the CancelMove.
CancelMove:0.15
#如果这一数值启用，则使用HeadMove的阈值来确定要防御多少伤害。
#举个例子，如果这一阈值是8，并且玩家的阈值是4，那么就可以阻止50%的伤害。
#如果这一数值关闭，如果玩家不进行CancelMove，那么将会抵挡住100%的伤害。

      UseHeadMoveThreshold: true
      #The minimum Threshold a player must have hit for the HeadMove checks to cancel ANY damage from CancelMove.
      #If the Threshold is below (or the same as) this, CancelMove will not cancel any hits!
UseHeadMoveThreshold:true
#启用后玩家必须对 HeadMove的最小阈值进行检查，以消除进行CancelMove带来的伤害。
#如果阈值较低（或相同），CancelMove将不会取消任何攻击！

      MinimumBlockThreshold: 2
#The time that a player "cannot" attack, and if they do their threshold will be raised. Does not block actual hits.
MinimumBlockThreshold:2
#这设定了一个玩家“不能”进行攻击的时间，如果他们这么做，这一数值就会被提升。这一设定不会阻止实际的攻击。

    CantAttackTime: 8
#Amount of hacking hits to detect the person as hacking.
CantAttackTime:8
#进行大量的黑客攻击来检测玩家的黑客行为。

    Threshold: 8
#How low should the Threshold be lowered every time a non-hacking hit occurs?
Threshold:8
#每次非黑客攻击发生时，阈值应该降低多少?

SafeHitDecrease: 0.8
HeadCommand: kick %PLAYER% Killaura is not allowed!
#broadcast %PLAYER% was kicked for hacking! (Killaura)(H)
SafeHitDecrease:0.8
最优先的命令：攻击%玩家%的杀戮光环是不被允许的！
#广播%玩家%因为进行黑客攻击被踢出！（杀戮光环）(H)

  Accuracy:
    #Enable the accuracy check? This checks how many hits are on target.
    #This does NOT check how close the cursor is to the hitbox of the enemy. It only checks for hits/misses. The angle check does that.
    Enabled: true
    #Take a look at the HeadMove check. This is exactly the same. 
    #Except that it is the point where the player must have moved their head recently this much to be defined as "Moving their head".
#If a player has not moved their head much, it means they are hitting a static entity, in which case detecting hacks via accuracy would be impossible.
Accuracy:
#启用精准度检查吗?这将检查多少次攻击命中目标。
#这并不能检查光标与敌人的碰撞箱有多近。它只检查是命中还是闪避。检验的角度就是这样的。
启用：true
#看一看HeadMove的检查。这是完全一样的。
#除此之外，重点是玩家们必须移动他们的头，这样才能被定义为“移动了他们的头”。
#如果一个玩家没有移动他们的头，那就意味着他们正在攻击一个静态的实体，在这种情况下，精确检测黑客攻击是不可能的。

    IsMoving: 0.03
#This will add extra threshold to a hit if it is from a large distance.
IsMoving:0.03
#如果相距很远，这将给命中的攻击增加一个额外的阈值。

   DistanceAccounting:
      #Enable distance accounting?
      Enabled: true
      #How far away do you want the hit to be before extra threshold is added to it?
      #For example: If DistanceAmount is 3 and the hit if 4 blocks away, the Threshold will be increased by 1.3, not 1.
      #If hit was 5 blocks away, the Threshold would be increased by 1.6.
DistanceAccounting:
#启用距离计算?
#启用:true
#在增加额外阙值之前，你希望相距多远？
#例如:如果DistanceAmount数值为3，如果相隔4个方块的攻击命中，那么阈值将会增加1.3，而不是1。
#如果距离5个方块的攻击命中，那么阈值就会增加1.6。

      DistanceAmount: 3.5
      #The "weight" of distance. Each block of distance is multiplied by the DistanceWeight.
      #To use the above example: If a player was 4 blocks away with a DistanceAmount of 3, the threshold would be raised by 1.3.
      #If DistanceWeight was at 1.0, it would be raised by 2.0 instead of 1.3.
DistanceAmount:3.5
#距离的“分量”。每个方块的距离都将乘以DistanceWeight。
#使用上面的例子:如果一个玩家离自己有4个方块的距离，而DistanceAmount 数值为3，那么阈值将被提升1.3。
#如果DistanceWeight数值为1.0，那么阙值提升2.0而不是1.3。

      DistanceWeight: 0.25
    #Take into account movement on the yaw axis only?
#This means if a player is swinging their head up and down wildly, they won't be counted as hacking.
DistanceWeight:0.25
#只考虑坐标轴的运动吗?
#这意味着，如果一个玩家疯狂地摇头晃脑，他们就不会被算作是在进行黑客攻击。

    YawOnly: true
#How high the threshold has to be to detect the player as hacking.
YawOnly:true
阈值必须是多少才能检测到玩家的黑客行为。

    Threshold: 8
#How much should the Threshold decrease each time a player interacts without hitting an opponent.
阈值:8
#当一个玩家在没有攻击对手而进行交互的情况下，阙值会降低多少。

    ArmSwingDecrease: 0.20
#How much should the Threshold decrease per second of time?
ArmSwingDecrease:0.20
#每秒钟阈值会降低多少?
    DecreasePerSecond: 0.15
AccuracyCommand: kick %PLAYER% Killaura is not allowed!
#broadcast %PLAYER% was kicked for hacking! (Killaura)(A)
DecreasePerSecond:0.15
准确命令：攻击%玩家%的杀戮光环是不被允许的！
#广播：%玩家%因为黑客攻击被踢出！（杀戮光环）(A)

replies.author: 子德
replies.txt_content:
像素君 发表于 2017-7-7 09:08
我不熟悉这个，所以翻译可能有错，记得检查一下~某些我看着像是命令所以没有翻译：

HeadMove:
噢，辛苦了，谢谢。我似乎漏了一小段...能帮忙就好了。十分感激。
Angle:
    #Enable the blockage of clients hitting outside of their field of view?
    Enabled: true
    #The distance, in blocks, that the players cursor must be from the target to count the hit as hacking.
    HackingAngle: 1.8
    #If the distance between the cursor and the target is more than HackingAngle multiplied by 2, cancel the hit?
    BlockImpossibleHits: true
    #Amount of hacking hits to detect the person as hacking.
    Threshold: 8
    #How low should the Threshold be lowered every time a non-hacking hit occurs?
    SafeHitDecrease: 1.0
    AngleCommand: kick %PLAYER% Killaura is not allowed!#broadcast %PLAYER% was kicked for hacking! (Killaura)(An)

replies.author: 像素君
replies.txt_content:
zide888@qq.com 发表于 2017-7-7 10:44
噢，辛苦了，谢谢。我似乎漏了一小段...能帮忙就好了。十分感激。
Angle:
    #Enable the blockage of c ...
里面有一句我不好理解，就放着了~我的翻译可能有错，记得检查一下：

Angle:
#是否允许玩家在他们的视野之外进行阻挡?
启用:true
#The distance, in blocks, that the players cursor must be from the target to count the hit as hacking.

HackingAngle:1.8
#如果光标和目标之间的距离超过了HackingAngle乘以2的值，取消命中结果？

BlockImpossibleHits:true
#进行大量的黑客攻击来检测这个人的黑客行为。

Threshold:8
#每次非黑客攻击发生时，阈值应降低多少?

SafeHitDecrease:1.0
#角度命令:攻击%玩家%杀戮光环的行为是不被允许的！
#广播：%玩家%因为进行黑客攻击被踢出了！(杀戮光环)(An)
